title: Casual Italic Script
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414064026im_/http:/typophile.com/files/a-rrrrr_5576.jpg)

I searched and searched,

but no luck.

Thanks in advance!
author: 5star

comments.content:
Can't identify it and really doubt it could be something else than a heavy (and amateurish) customization, or even a mash-up. Many details look weird: /R top left corner (serif removed?), /R leg (which looks to have been added to a a /P actually), weird /s and /r among the orthers...  
Some alternatives but far from being even loosely similar: [Terital United](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414064026/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/letterbox/terital-united), [Deftone Stylus](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414064026/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typodermic/deftone-stylus), [Wisdom Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414064026/http:/www.losttype.com/font/?name=wisdom_script), [Duvall](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414064026/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/john-moore/duvall)

Thanks Ryuk!

I thought it might have been a mash-up as you say because the /s/ looks out of place and the /R looks really awkward.
